definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Did the that stir-fry cargo Shandong for strong man's a night actually go where?
sentences.chinese: 炒货山东壮汉一夜之间究竟去了哪里？

sentences.english: Overnight, they were forcibly deprived of their living.
sentences.chinese: 一夜之间，他们的生计被强制剥夺了。

sentences.english: Wawa Village is open only at night.
sentences.chinese: 瓦瓦村庄仅仅一夜之间就开放了。

sentences.english: The mixture was agitated overnight on a magnetic stirrer at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 一夜之间就被激动的混合物在室温下磁力搅拌器。

sentences.english: You can't just flip a switch and jump up production overnight.
sentences.chinese: 你总不能拉个开关就呼一声一夜之间全给生产出来了。

sentences.english: We need to turn this around, but can't do so overnight.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要改变这种状况，但不可能在一夜之间就做到。
那首歌一夜之间流行开来。

sentences.english: The snow drifted into huge mounds overnight.
sentences.chinese: 雪一夜之间被吹积成许多大堆。

sentences.english: COMMUNICATION Go slow and don t try to share every tidbit of information about yourself over night.
sentences.chinese: 通讯怠工和顿河笔尝试分享自己的资料每粒一夜之间。

sentences.english: Six robberies in one night put our village in turmoil.
sentences.chinese: 一夜之间发生六起劫案，全村陷入一片混乱。

sentences.english: Prices for the presold vintage jumped 17% overnight.
sentences.chinese: 一夜之间，这款葡萄酒价格涨了17%。

sentences.english: Overnight the ship drifted in a long arc to the west.
sentences.chinese: 一夜之间，这艘船漂向了西边，留下一道长长的。

sentences.english: As if some deus ex machina had wrought these changes overnight.
sentences.chinese: 就好像某神灵下凡，一夜之间带来了这些变化。
奥赛罗的头发一夜之间全变白了。

sentences.english: It seemed as if overnight an invisible wall had been erected between us.
sentences.chinese: 就好像在一夜之间，我们之间竖起了一堵无形的墙。

sentences.english: How did you go about disguising zits when they appeared overnight?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎样忍受讨厌的青春痘在一夜之间冒出来的？

definition: to vanish without trace (idiom)/to lie low
to change shape in a single shake/fig. to take on a new lease of life
to engulf/to sweep/to carry away everything
to adjust one's head and turn one's face (idiom); cosmetic changes/Despite superficially new policies, the substance remains unchanged.
to get round fast/to spread like wildfire
to go up in smoke/to vanish
